Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces

Interface LineByLineProcessorCallback

All Known Implementing Classes:
Asm, JsonSaxParser, Macros
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface
public interface LineByLineProcessorCallback

This interface uses with the LineByLineProcessor class to support lambda-styled callback for it

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
LineByLineProcessor
LastUpdate:
0.0.3

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void processLine​(long displacement, int lineNo, char[] data, int from, int length)
    Process line from the source character stream

  • Method Details

    • processLine

      void processLine​(long displacement, int lineNo, char[] data, int from, int length) throws java.io.IOException, SyntaxException

      Process line from the source character stream

      Parameters:
      displacement - of the same first char from the beginning of the data stream
      lineNo - 1-based sequential line number in the data stream
      data - data stream to process. This data is in almost all cases a true source data, so you must not modify it to avoid unpredictable side effects in the caller methods
      from - starting position of the actual line in the data stream
      length - length of the actual line in the data stream
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - is any I/O errors were detected
      SyntaxException - is any syntax errors were detected
